name: Alchembrew
startIntroPart2: You, President Zephyr Xavier Maelstrom, are the leader of the Republic of the Rising Star, the mighty Alchembrew.  After winning independence from Germany, you must now lead your nation to prosperity!
declaringWar: You have crossed Alchembrew one too many times. Now, prepare to be destroyed like the you have. never seen before
attacked: Your army fighting my army is like bringing a knife to a gunfight. After we win the war, you will be exiled, and forced to live away from any civilization, as an outcast.
defeated: We may have fallen, but the Aether will still crush you.
introduction: Hello. I am President Zephyr Maelstrom, of Alchembrew.  I welcome you to the land of the Rising Star.  Would you like to play a game of football?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
